message: I think it would be cool (as well as clutter-reducing) to allow users to edit their first replies ten seconds or something after they submit
just so they could get rid of stupid typos
i guess you can delete your reply and type it over
Yeah, I think two things are needed: allowing users to edit their replies for a certain time, and inserting a placeholder when people delete their message, so people know a message was there.
Deleting messages also messes up the flow of the topic when someone quickly replies after you send your typo filled message.
